solution_line_template: Mrs. Merril wants to follow {recommended_hours} hours x {minutes_per_hour} minutes/hour = <<{recommended_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_allowed_minutes}>>{total_allowed_minutes} minutes screen time.

Since her child already used up {used_minutes_morning} minutes, he is allowed to use his gadget this evening for {total_allowed_minutes} minutes - {used_minutes_morning} minutes = <<{total_allowed_minutes}-{used_minutes_morning}={remaining_minutes_evening}>>{remaining_minutes_evening} minutes.
